DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study study MIGRA-ZEN RELIEF PLUS , all-natural herbal dietary supplement product , respect alleviate and/or stop migraine headache pain compare placebo use prophylactically . This study involve subject suffer chronic migraine headache .
DOC.brief_title: Study MIGRA-ZEN RELIEF PLUS In Treatment Chronic Migraine Headache
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose 90-day , randomize , double-blind , placebo control study evaluate efficacy all-natural herbal dietary supplement product , ( Investigational Product , IP ) , respect alleviate and/or stop migraine headache pain compare placebo use prophylactically every day , evaluate safety/risk use observe absence/presence adverse event ( AE/SAE ) report normalcy blood work , urinalysis , liver enzyme test . The primary end-point time-course depth frequency reduction migraine attack . The secondary end-points absence/presence detectable adverse liver function urinalysis test result well dearth/abundance AE/SAE report may indicate patient safety/risk use IP .
DOC.criteria: Male female subject 18 year age older . Prior study subject must diagnose migraine accord IHS criterion qualify healthcare professional experience diagnosis migraine suffer one year prior start study . Migraine symptoms/attacks must present minimum last consecutive three ( 3 ) month minimum average frequency six ( 6 ) time per month must severeextreme ( grade 710 ) linear scale 010 , 0=no pain 10=unbearable maximum pain . Subjects able follow protocol design RZN Nutraceuticals , Inc. Teva Pharmaceutical Industries . Generally good health Subjects currently take prophylactic treatment migraine headache History head trauma brain cancer . Candidate subject medical condition , opinion investigator intake staff , would jeopardize safety patient , affect validity data collect subject , would challenge subject 's ability complete study protocol 90 day . Known renal insufficiency kidney disease grade Any illness cause severe cough avoid introduce `` cough migraine '' per IHS classification 4.2 , G44.803 . History drug addiction . BP > 150/100 ) .
